Message:
Are you going to that bakery
you’ve recently taken a liking to...?

The snow is really
coming down today.
Take care of yourself so
you don’t catch a cold, okay?

As I watch over
my prince from afar,
I don’t hear any
voices around me,
until one suddenly
reaches my ears.

“The Holy Night’s almost here.
Now’s the time to give your
sweetheart a special gift!”

Come to think of it,
I think I’ve heard
about that as a child.

Once a year,
you give a special gift
to your special someone
on the Holy Night.

Back then, there wasn’t anyone
for me to give a gift to, but...
Hehe!

Now I have you,
my dear prince.

I’ll prepare
a wonderful gift,
just for you.
